column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Food... service... drinks... ambiance... location... Bavette's has it all! My family and I came here for dinner for our 9th anniversary and I didn't want to leave. Bavette's not only provides superb food and service
column2: but the environment is reminiscent of dining in an intimate room. We will definitely be back for a date night out.. minus the kids
